        public void setPlayed​(boolean isPlayed)

        Parameters:
        isPlayed - variable that holds the state
        Postcondition
        isPlayed has the value true or false depending on the actions

        Returns:

      • movePawn

        public boolean movePawn​(Pawn p,
                        Deck b)
        Moves a pawn on the board with the card value
        Parameters:
        p - a Pawn
        b - a Board
        Returns:
        true if the pawn moved else returns false
        Postcondition
        pawn moves if possible else it doesn't
